      public void movementStateMachine()
      Method to find out players state

      Using velocities method finds out in what state the player is in order to give him correct animation.

    • postStep

      public void postStep(city.cs.engine.StepEvent stepEvent)
      General player controller method.

      Checks whether the player is dead and also checks conditions to go to other levels. Also checks whether the player was damaged and if he was sets appropriate animation.

      Specified by:
      postStep in interface city.cs.engine.StepListener
